resources.string: Too many password errors, please log in using your password

• Please ensure secure backup your wallet.SmartMesh APP cannot access accounts,recounts keys,reset passwords,nor reverse transactions.You are responsible for your security.\n\n• Tourists(no MID and bound phone number, mailbox) to exit will not save wallet information.
Inconsistent with the previous drawing, please re-draw
You can customize the MID for login and user search.
For account safety, please enter MID to ensure login success
By logging out, there will NOT be any new message alert but all the historial data will be stored.
Please read the following instructions carefully:
Not set MID, bind phone or email account will not be able to log in again, and the wallet can not be retrieved. Are you sure you want to do this?
Your account will not be able to log in again after you click OK. If you have used your wallet, please check if it is backed up.
Gas price too Height，is recommended less than 100 gwei
Gas price is too low, is recommended greater than 8 gwei
The address Mesh tokens are locked, do not transfer. Gas consumed can not be recovered.
At the moment, only support for gate.io and okex.com coins are used for this function. Temporarily do not use other platforms, so as to avoid unnecessary loss of digital property.
To ensure safety of your balance, please do not disclose your privacy to others.
There is a security risk on your mobile phone. Please use this app after this issue is solved.
Loading page error. Please try again
Request timeout! Please try again later
Network is not available, please try again later
View or edit your personal profile
Release your finger to cancel sending
You are invited to %s. Let\'s chat!
You can only favorite uploaded files
Leave a message to your friend
Photo has been saved to %s document
This type of message does not support cross-application forwarding
File can only send to Off Internet Comunication user
%s please add me as a friend
Wants to add you as a friend
This user is not your friend
I don\'t accept this user\'s speech
%1$s has sent you %2$s,Please update to the newest version to view.
[SmartMesh]Prohibited access to private data: GPS location dataa. You can change it in Settings> Rights Management
You are invited by %s to join a group chat
You are invited to join a group chat
You are removed from this group chat by group owner
You invited %s to join a group chat
You moved %s out of this group chat
Are you sure you want to join this group chat?
Update the name of this group chat
Unable to obtain group information, please check for existence
You have not created a group chat yet
Are you sure to delete this member?
Press Scan QR Code in Image
[%1$s] invited you to join the SmartMesh App Group [%2$s] %3$s click the copy link, and then select the browser to open
After removing from blacklist, this user becomes your friend
You can open or close Off Internet Comunication on Me → Setting
Please link your phone number to ensure account safety
Please link your email to ensure account safety
SmartMesh wallet is a mobile blockchain wallet app which easy and safe to use. SmartMesh wallet can also be used to save and transfer ETH,SMT and other digital currency.
Please set account names with 1–12 digits
This may take a few minutes
Wallet creating... just a moment please!
We suggest you to have a back up account. Export hints and save them before trasferring a small amount.

Note: SmartMesh wallet does not save user password nor provide backups. All password are required to backup using encrypted private key. We highly recommended to backup and save your private key at the same time, otherwise your wallet can never be retrieved.
You havent fill in the specific issues
You havent fill in the specific Suggestions
Please leave your valuable opinions and Suggestions, we will try to improve.
Please input the correct email address
email address can not is empty
Please enter the private key in text
Copy and paste Ether keystore, or scan QR code
Observe mode only needs the wallet address
Address must start with 0x in total with 42 digits
Deleting accounts cannot be reversed. Are you sure?
Transfer not supported in observe mode
Private key can only be exported once, please keep it safe
Synchronize to the latest block to use the wallet
ETH light node wallets support create transfor and purchase SMT can also be used.
The wallet is your block chain account which is total different from wensite／app account and it\'s cryptographic based.
You need to doble check the wallet is being backup properly in case of any assets loss.
We suggest you backup mnemonic words and keystore both,the test with tiny ethers untill you feel comfidencr.
Use for recovring wallet，please store physically.
Encryed with your transaction password,please remember it.
I passed your friend request, chat now!

string-array.name: delete_clear_top_chat_array
string-array.item: Erase all history in this chat

string-array.name: clear_to_top_chat_array
string-array.item: Erase all history in this chat
